Package Controller

Class MainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller.MainController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class MainController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Controls the appointment tableview in the main screen.

                 throws java.sql.SQLException

      • onActionModAppt

        void onActionModAppt​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Brings user to modify appointment screen. The onActionModAppt method uses the Modify Appointment Controller sendAppointment method to send the selected appointment information to the modify screen.

        event -
        Throws:

      • onActionWeekDisplay

        void onActionWeekDisplay()
        Lambda expression in this method filters the appointment table by week.
        This expression improved code by allowing the filter to occur in this onActionWeekDisplay method, rather than creating a separate method in the DBAppointments with a query, and calling it in the onAction method. How to convert date to ObservableValue found here : https://stackoverflow.com/questions/14413040/converting-integer-to-observablevalueinteger-in-javafx
